text_block_list.text:
While walking through the city a few days 
after the Selection Race ——

text_block_list.name: Flyer Distributor
text_block_list.text:
Hey, you there! Wanna come watch the Freestyle Race? 
It's heating up in the back alleys over there～!

text_block_list.name: Flyer Distributor
text_block_list.text:
The Twinkle Series is great and all, but freestyle's also real fun! 
… Ah, little miss horsegirl over there! You wouldn't want to miss 
out either, I'm sure～!!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Palmer
text_block_list.text: —— Freestyle…? Wait a minute, you're that trainer from before!
choice_data_list: Hello, are you in the middle of running?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Palmer
text_block_list.text:
Yeah, sort of. Just doing a light warm-up run while thinking 
about a "style that suits me", like you mentioned after the race. 
Something along those lines?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Palmer
text_block_list.text: Anyway, freestyle, huh? I have heard of it before, but I've never actually seen it in person…

text_block_list.name: Flyer Distributor
text_block_list.text:
Both of you interested?! Looks like it! Come here, come here! 
You can even join in on the spot, so knock yourself out!!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Palmer
text_block_list.text: Huh? Ah, o-okay?!

Freestyle Races are amateur races organized by horsegirls 
who want to run freely and unrestrained, making use of 
unoccupied open areas and the like.

Some horsegirls choose not to pursue a professional career, 
even if they are fast. These kinds of races, where such horsegirls 
can compete to their heart's content, attract many fans as well.

text_block_list.name: Freestyle Race Audience
text_block_list.text: (Woaaaaaaah!!!)

text_block_list.name: Freestyle Race Horsegirls
text_block_list.text:
"Ooooooooooohhhhhh!!" "Uraaaaahhhhhh!!" 
"That first place's got! My name! On iiiiiit!!!"
choice_data_list: S-So, this is what freestyle's like……!

text_block_list.text: The horsegirls here have a rough, self-taught running style, but it's so… passionate! The feisty competition where everyone lays bare their fighting spirit awakens something deep inside!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Palmer
text_block_list.text:
… The atmosphere here is totally different from official races. 
So this is what freestyle's like……!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Palmer
text_block_list.text:
Wow… this is kinda amazing. 
I feel so… fired up, just by watching…!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Palmer
text_block_list.text: ……! Yeah… yeah, I'll give it a try!!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Palmer
text_block_list.text:
Hey, you girls! Can I join in too!? 
I'm down for any race!

text_block_list.name: Eyebrowless Horsegirl
text_block_list.text:
Whoa, jumpin' straight in, eh?! Got some guts, mate! 
Go right ahead. What's ya name?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Palmer
text_block_list.text: Ah, um… Palmer. My name is Mejiro Palmer.

text_block_list.name: Horsegirl with Tongue Piercing
text_block_list.text:
Ahh, Mejiro～ Got a famous one here～ Well, that's kinda long 
so I'm just gonna call you Palmer, 'kay～? As for your number, 
we'll draw it right before the race, at the gate～

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Palmer
text_block_list.text: O-Okay!? Just Palmer… is fine, I guess?

text_block_list.name: Horsegirl with Tongue Piercing
text_block_list.text:
Hmm? Well yeah～ It's kinda long, so nobody's gonna 
remember, get me? But then, even if it's short, nobody 
might remember anyway～ If you don't win, you know～?

text_block_list.name: Eyebrowless Horsegirl
text_block_list.text:
Ya, easy stuff! Just gotta score that win, yeah? The way 
we do things over here, it's all about the runnin' and the raw 
strength, mate. So, ya ready to hit it, Palmer?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Palmer
text_block_list.text: ……!! ……Got it! Thanks for having me!!

text_block_list.name: Commentator
text_block_list.text:
Off they go! Taking the lead is participant number two, 
in the red jersey, who joined the race as a wild card. 
How will they fare against the competition?!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Palmer
text_block_list.text: (Alright, calm down and focus. Just do it like usual…!)

text_block_list.name: Determined Horsegirl
text_block_list.text:
YEEEEHAWWWWW!! I'M GONNA LEAVE 
YA'LL LAGGING BEHIND, BABY————!!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Palmer
text_block_list.text:
(… Whoa! This is intense! Seeing her up close, I can feel 
her raw determination and spirit! To think someone could 
run with so much bravado…!)

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Palmer
text_block_list.text:
(I wonder… if I should give it a try too…? 
Yeah… after all, this is where we can run freely…!)

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Palmer
text_block_list.text:
(Moreover, right now I'm just "number two" who 
jumped in on a whim! Not a Mejiro, just Palmer…!)

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Palmer
text_block_list.text: (Whether I win or lose, being a Mejiro doesn't matter…!)

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Palmer
text_block_list.text: —— GAH! HAAAAAAAHHHHHHHH!!!!

text_block_list.name: Commentator
text_block_list.text:
So fast! Unbelievable! The winner is number two, Palmer! 
Her speed is simply unmatched! A dominating victory with 
a whopping 6 length lead!!!!!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Palmer
text_block_list.text: —— Haa… haa… Maaaan, what just happened… That was crazy! I had so much fun…!

text_block_list.name: Eyebrowless Horsegirl
text_block_list.text:
Whoa, whoa, whoa, whoaaa!!! Ya bloody nailed it, mate! 
Gettin' spicy 'round here innit! Toss us another round, Palmer!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Palmer
text_block_list.text:
… Yeah! That sounds great! I wanna run more too…! 
I wanna… unleash my full power and just go for it!!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Palmer
text_block_list.text:
(My legs won't stop…! The wind feels so good…! 
It feels like my body is in the best condition it has ever been!!)

text_block_list.name: Horsegirl with Tongue Piercing
text_block_list.text:
Woow, Palmer's got a fine pair of legs on her～ 
It's absurd how she outruns everyone～ …Hmm?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Palmer
text_block_list.text: Haah! Haa! Haah! Ahaha…… crap, I may have gone a little too wild, ahah……!

text_block_list.name: Horsegirl with Tongue Piercing
text_block_list.text: Pfft… ahahahaha! She's way too into this～! Didn't think too far ahead though, did she? Ahaha… she's a real riot～!!

text_block_list.name: Freestyle Race Horsegirls
text_block_list.text:
Palmer!! Go, go! Keep pushing! Outrun them, Palmer!!! 
You're doing great, Palmer～! Go, go! Get that victory～!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Palmer
text_block_list.text:
Okay! This time I'm making my escape for sure, so watch me!! 
Everyone, engrave this moment in your memory—!!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Palmer
text_block_list.text: GAAAAAAHHHHHHHHHHHHH!!!

By the time all the races scheduled for today's 
freestyle event came to an end, the hype surrounding 
Mejiro Palmer had reached its climax…

text_block_list.name: Freestyle Race Horsegirls
text_block_list.text: PALーMER! PALーMER! PALーMER! PALーMER!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Palmer
text_block_list.text:
Wow, haha… I can't believe this is happening, seriously. 
This is crazy… To have my name being cheered like this!!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Palmer
text_block_list.text:
Thank you so much———!! 
This is the best feeling ever———!!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Palmer
text_block_list.text: —— Haaa～ I still feel so light and floaty…

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Palmer
text_block_list.text:
Yeah, right? It was a new experience for me… completely 
different from the Selection Race. Even people who didn't 
know that I was a Mejiro were shouting "Palmer"…!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Palmer
text_block_list.text: Ah, that felt so good～ Hands down, that was the best time of my life!! You know, I feel like I want to do more things like that from now on.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Palmer
text_block_list.text:
Yeah… Yeah! I want to put the name "Mejiro Palmer" 
into everyone's mind… engrave it!!

Mejiro Palmer's eyes sparkled with determination. 
As I looked on, witnessing her discovering her own 
grand dream, I couldn't help myself…
choice_data_list: May I help you achieve your dream?
May I help you achieve your dream?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Palmer
text_block_list.text: Huh! Was that… a contract question, just now? Really?
choice_data_list: Absolutely! If you're okay with it!
Absolutely! If you're okay with it!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Palmer
text_block_list.text:
…… Thank you. I'm really happy about that! 
Alright, then from now on… you'll be my trainer! 
Pleased to be working together!
